pages.text:
About Grove Roots
Our city. Our brewery. Our beer.
Whether you‚Äôre a Winter Haven native or a traveling hop head, Grove Roots exists for you. It‚Äôs your back-porch bar. Your after-work bee-line. Your homebrew away from home. There‚Äôs always something going on, and community camaraderie is always on tap. So let‚Äôs raise a glass to sun-dappled lakes, moss-draped canals and dusky, orange-blossom nights.
Why? Because this is Winter Haven, and life is good.
7
Meet the brewmaster
Some Pulp Nonfiction
About Joe Dunham
Do what you love. Love what you do.
Deciding to open a brewery in your hometown when you already have a successful career in a construction management firm several states away?
That‚Äôs a lager of love.
Thankfully, Joe had the quit-your-day-job level of passion needed to bring his Grove Roots vision‚Äîand the city‚Äôs first craft beer brewery‚Äîto life. It‚Äôs your typical Polk County boomerang story. Leave for a while, then whip back in. Determined.
With zing
.
About Grove Roots
Our city. Our brewery. Our beer.
Whether you‚Äôre a Winter Haven native or a traveling hop head, Grove Roots exists for you. It‚Äôs your back-porch bar. Your after-work bee-line. Your homebrew away from home. There‚Äôs always something going on, and community camaraderie is always on tap. So let‚Äôs raise a glass to sun-dappled lakes, moss-draped canals and dusky, orange-blossom nights.
Why? Because this is Winter Haven, and life is good.
7

Get in touch
Squeezed to meet you
Get In Touch
If you‚Äôd like to schedule a¬†special event, reserve tables for a party, or just send us a love note, drop us a line by filling out the form below.

We offer a craft brewery with a private event space located in downtown Winter Haven. Perfect for special occasions, wedding parties, and corporate events.
Request to Book
7
The Event Space
Step into The Packing House, our private event space where rustic charm meets modern comfort. Beyond the sliding barn door separating it from the main tasting room, you‚Äôll discover a welcoming setting with eight large farmhouse tables, cozy lounge areas, wood barrels, and a private bar‚Äîideal for your next celebration. Enjoy our selection of wine, craft soda, and, of course, exceptional beer. For added convenience, a prep area for caterers is available, ensuring every detail of your event is handled seamlessly.
Features
3,000 sq. ft. private event space
Maximum capacity: 150 guests
Seating: Table seating for 80 guests
Available 7 days a week, Monday through Sunday
Trained bartenders included with event rental
16 beers on tap, plus wine, cider, and soda options
Dual entrance with handicap accessibility
Private restrooms
Wi-Fi access
Speakers for background music
Catering prep area
Access to the public taproom
Event Types
Corporate Meetings & Events
Workshops & Seminars
Adult Birthday Parties
(Please note that we are unable to host children‚Äôs birthday parties or quincea√±eras.)
Family Reunions
Rehearsal Dinners, Wedding Receptions, Engagement Parties, Bridal Showers, Welcome Parties
Retirement & Appreciation Events
Holiday Parties
Anniversary Celebrations
Networking Events
Fundraisers & Charity Events
Rental Info
Ôâ¥
Event Experience
Our dedicated staff will work with you to tailor your event and ensure a memorable experience. We‚Äôre happy to provide recommendations and referrals for catering, florists, photographers, and entertainment.
Ôûü
Bar Options
You may choose between an open bar, cash bar, or a set tab for your guests. Please note that a minimum bar tab with 20% gratuity is required. Last call will be 30 minutes before the scheduled end of the event.
Setup/Cleanup
Rental times include required 1 hour for setup and 1 hour for cleanup with a 3 hour party. Time may be added for an additional fee.
ÔõÄ
Furniture
The venue includes eight 8ft. farmhouse style tables, each with ten chairs, for your event.
Ôû¶
Entertainment Options
We offer several options for music and entertainment. Live bands and acoustic acts are welcome. For a more relaxed vibe, you can choose a Pandora station or share a Spotify playlist for background music.
Ôãß
Catering & Food
The Packing House includes a prep area for caterers, and outside food is welcome. As the host, you‚Äôll coordinate directly with your caterer. Please note that all beer, wine, and soda must be purchased through Grove Roots Brewing.
ÓÅº
Pricing
Event rentals have a minimum duration of 5 hours. We‚Äôll work with you to create a rental package that fits your needs. For pricing information, please email us at
events@groveroots.com
.
Things to Consider & Policies
Outside food is always welcome, but outside beverages are not permitted.
No liquor is allowed on the premises.
Beer and other beverages are not included in the rental fee.
Minors are allowed when accompanied by a parent or guardian.
No open flames, glitter, confetti, or adhesives.
Any changes in the event time must be made one week prior to the event date.
If the event is cancelled 30 days or more prior to its scheduled date, the client will be refunded 50% of the event price. If the event is cancelled for any reason within 29 days of its scheduled date, the client will not be refunded.
Book Your Event Today!
Contact us to reserve The Packing House and begin planning your event. Our team is here to help you every step of the way. Secure your date now!
